answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!I can understand your concern and believe me this needs a lot of investigations to know what could be wrong. To begin with you need a MRI of the brain and upper cervical spine to find out if there is a lesion or nerve compression. Blood pressure should be checked. Get blood tests for anemia, diabetes and thyroid problems as this can be the cause of fatigue and headache.If you do not have insurance, see if there is a walk in clinic you can approach.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: can you help me . i have had pain in my neck for about two years i am also having alot of head ackes so bad i am sick or extreamly fatuiged most of the time i had a bad head injury in 2000 and have been strugling with life every since noone realy seems to understand that this is a reality to me and i am suffering and slipping away and cant aford medical attention. to them it is all in my head. hopefully you will not feal that way please help me i am 38 years old married and have a wonderfull wife all i whant besides god is to be able to care for her and keep her safe not be in the way with all that is going on with my body i am still here but with the strugle comes misunderstanding from those around me i am not sure how long i can hold on please help.          thank you for your time and god bless you!!!!!!!
title: lot of pain and fear
